page.title: 17LOCAL EVENTS IN NAIRN
page.content: {THE NAIRN GAMES}are held annually on the first Saturday after the 12th of{ {August.}The games have been taking place on the links at Nairn for over 100 years and are one of the few { {Highland games}in Scotland to be free.The games attract heavy weight competitors to participate in events such as tossing the caber,and throwing the 56 pound weight over the bar.It has come a tradition for Nairn people from all parts of the world to arrange meetings with their friends at the games. {Nairnshire Farming Society Show-}held annually on the first Wednesday in { {August}at the farmers field.The show attracts large numbers of locals and visitors to view the livestock;fruit, vegetables and flower tents;pets parade;horse jumping and display of farm machinery.
